title: Dinnerbone&Searge: 本周将不会有快照
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-4-17 12:00 编辑 




@Dinnerbone
There will likely not be a snapshot again this week due to swedish holidays & visiting Blockholm.
由于瑞典节假日和要参加 Blockholm（Minecraft方块展会），所以本周将不会有新快照。

@SeargeDP
We are not going to have a snapshot tomorrow, but having a snapshot next week is not completely unlikely ;)
明天（今天 / 这星期）将不会有快照，但下星期会有快照并不是不可能 ;)
